title: The Blues Brothers
plot: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

title: The Crow: Salvation
plot: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

title: Niagara
plot: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

title: Stir of Echoes
plot: A man has visions of a missing neighborhood girl.
cast: ['Zachary David Cope', 'Kevin Bacon', 'Kathryn Erbe', 'Illeana Douglas', 'Kevin Dunn']

title: Big Trouble in Little China
plot: A rough-and-tumble trucker and his sidekick face off with an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

title: Jerry and Tom
plot: Tom and Jerry are two hit men, they work by day at a third-rate second-hand car dealership. Tom is a veteran and Jerry is a novice in their business, and their attitude toward their profession differs a lot. It shows when Tom is required to kill his old friend Karl.—Anonymous

title: The Rocketeer
plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

title: Celebrity
plot: The fortunes of a husband and wife differ drastically after they divorce.

title: Urban Legend
plot: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

title: An American Tail
plot: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must locate them while trying to survive in a new country.

title: The Kentucky Fried Movie
plot: The daily programming of a fictional local TV channel presented as a series of highly irreverent skits.

title: Shaft
plot: A crime lord hires black private eye, John Shaft, to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.
cast: ['Richard Roundtree', 'Moses Gunn', 'Charles Cioffi', 'Christopher St. John', 'Gwenn Mitchell']

title: Buddy
plot: A depiction of the true life story of Gertrude Lintz, an eccentric 1920's socialite who tries to raise a gorilla, like many chimps before him, as part of her family.
cast: ['Rene Russo', 'Robbie Coltrane', 'Alan Cumming', 'Irma P. Hall', 'Peter Elliott']

title: Selena
plot: The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejana singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart-topping albums on the Latin music charts.

title: Antonia's Line
plot: A Dutch matron establishes and, for several generations, oversees a close-knit, matriarchal community where feminism and liberalism thrive.
cast: ['Willeke van Ammelrooy', 'Els Dottermans', 'Dora van der Groen', 'Veerle van Overloop', 'Esther Vriesendorp']

title: Boogie Nights
plot: An idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.
cast: ['Luis Guzmán', 'Burt Reynolds', 'Julianne Moore', 'Rico Bueno', 'John C. Reilly']

title: A Price Above Rubies
plot: This movie is about a young woman who is married to a devout Jew and the problems that trouble their marriage because of her wanting something more out of her life.

title: Squanto: A Warrior's Tale
plot: Fictional chronicle of Squanto's life prior to and including the arrival of the "Mayflower" in 1620.
cast: ['Adam Beach', 'Sheldon Peters Wolfchild', 'Irene Bedard', 'Eric Schweig', 'Leroy Peltier']

title: The Big Chill
plot: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

title: Junior
plot: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

title: First Kid
plot: A former boxer turned Secret Service agent is assigned to protect the President's son, who seems determined to make life difficult for his new protector.

title: Condorman
plot: Cartoonist Woody becomes the superhero he draws. Using his gadgets he helps a Soviet spy defect to the West.

title: The Money Pit
plot: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

title: The Object of My Affection
plot: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.
cast: ['Paul Rudd', 'Kali Rocha', 'Jennifer Aniston', 'Lena Cardwell', 'Natalie B. Kikkenborg']

title: The Razor's Edge
plot: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

title: One Eight Seven
plot: 15 months after being stabbed 9 times by a student at work as a high school teacher in NYC, Mr. Garfield is working in LA as a substitute teacher come full-time. He refuses to be a victim anymore.
cast: ['Samuel L. Jackson', 'John Heard', 'Kelly Rowan', 'Clifton Collins Jr.', 'Tony Plana']

title: Breaking the Waves
plot: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

title: The Great Muppet Caper
plot: Kermit the Frog, The Great Gonzo, and Fozzie Bear are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

title: Barry Lyndon
plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

title: Kundun
plot: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.
cast: ['Tenzin Thuthob Tsarong', 'Gyurme Tethong', 'Tulku Jamyang Kunga Tenzin', 'Tenzin Yeshi Paichang', 'Tencho Gyalpo']

title: Class Reunion
plot: It's been 10 years since Lizzie Borden High School's class of '72 graduated, and the preppies, the hippies and the in-crowd have returned to reminisce over good times past. Classmate Walter Baylor has returned too, but with a vengeance.

title: What About Bob?
plot: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

title: The Killing Fields
plot: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during Pol Pot's bloody Year Zero cleansing campaign.
cast: ['Sam Waterston', 'Haing S. Ngor', 'John Malkovich', 'Julian Sands', 'Craig T. Nelson']

title: Bulworth
plot: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.
cast: ['Kimberly Deauna Adams', 'Vinny Argiro', 'Sean Astin', 'Kirk Baltz', 'Ernie Lee Banks']

title: The Ghost and the Darkness
plot: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

title: The 13th Warrior
plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled in a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn
plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

title: One True Thing
plot: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.
cast: ['Meryl Streep', 'Renée Zellweger', 'William Hurt', 'Tom Everett Scott', 'Lauren Graham']

title: Rocky II
plot: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

title: Jacob's Ladder
plot: Mourning his dead son, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.
cast: ['Tim Robbins', 'Elizabeth Peña', 'Danny Aiello', 'Matt Craven', 'Pruitt Taylor Vince']

title: Only You
plot: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later, when she's about to marry someone else, a Damon Bradley calls to wish them well, and Faith blows off her wedding to follow Damon to Italy.
cast: ['Marisa Tomei', 'Robert Downey Jr.', 'Bonnie Hunt', 'Joaquim de Almeida', 'Fisher Stevens']

title: Misery
plot: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

title: Rear Window
plot: A bored photographer recovering from a broken leg passes the time by watching his neighbors and begins to suspect one of them of murder.

title: Exotica
plot: A man plagued by neuroses frequents the club Exotica in an attempt to find solace, but even there his past is never far away.

title: In the Realm of the Senses
plot: A fictionalized retelling of the story of Sada Abe, whose affair with her master quickly turned obsessive and sadomasochistic.

title: Under the Rainbow
plot: A visiting dignitary, a CIA agent, a Nazi spy, Japanese tourists, an assassin and a group of "midget" actors from The Wizard of Oz (1939) all check into an elite Los Angeles hotel called Under the Rainbow.

title: The Alarmist
plot: A young and hungry salesman lands a job with a company that installs alarm systems. He strikes up a sexual relationship with a woman client who is also a single mother and then learns some pretty unsavory things about the business.

title: Shanghai Noon
plot: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

title: A Night at the Roxbury
plot: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

title: Babes in Toyland
plot: Mary Contrary is set to marry Tom Piper when he is kidnapped by Roderigo and Gonzorgo, two goons working for the evil Barnaby who wants to marry Mary for her inheritance.

title: The Incredibly True Adventure of Two Girls in Love
plot: An adventurous love story between two young women of different social and economic backgrounds who find themselves going through all the typical struggles of a new romance.

title: Full Tilt Boogie
plot: A documentary about the production of From Dusk Till Dawn (1996) and the people who made it.
cast: ['Rick Stribling', 'Ken Bondy', 'Amy Minda Cohen', 'Elizabeth Avellan', 'Dieter Busch']

title: Bell Book and Candle
plot: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.

title: The Decline of Western Civilization Part II: The Metal Years
plot: Documentary showcase, what life was like for the music artists living during the Los Angeles Heavy Metal scene in the mid and late 1980s.

title: Flipper
plot: A teenage boy sent to spend the summer with his eccentric uncle on the Florida coast befriends a remarkable dolphin and takes on local bad guys who are polluting the water.

title: Cabaret
plot: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: The Straight Story
plot: Alvin Straight, a 73-year-old, learns that his estranged brother, Lyle is critically ill. Unable to drive, Alvin embarks on a journey from Iowa to Mt. Zion, by riding a lawn mower. Will he succeed?
cast: ['Sissy Spacek', 'Jane Galloway Heitz', 'Joseph A. Carpenter', 'Donald Wiegert', 'Richard Farnsworth']

title: Topsy-Turvy
plot: Set in the 1880s, the story of how, during a creative dry spell, the partnership of the legendary musical/theatrical writers Gilbert and Sullivan almost dissolves, before they turn it all around and write the Mikado.

title: Romeo Must Die
plot: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
plot: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

title: Superman II
plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

title: Laura
plot: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: Willow
plot: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

title: New Rose Hotel
plot: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, and decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

title: Flight of the Navigator
plot: In 1978, a boy travels eight years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.
cast: ['Joey Cramer', 'Paul Reubens', 'Cliff De Young', 'Veronica Cartwright', 'Sarah Jessica Parker']

title: The Three Musketeers
plot: France, 1625. Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers, but the evil cardinal has disbanded them. d'Artagnan meets Athos, Porthos, and Aramis, three rogue musketeers, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.

title: Mrs. Winterbourne
plot: Connie, unwed and pregnant, is heading to Boston by train when she meets wealthy newlyweds Hugh and Patricia. The train crashes, and when Connie comes to in the hospital, she is mistaken for Patricia, who died in the crash with Hugh.

title: Higher Learning
plot: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

title: Three Colors: White
plot: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

title: Volunteers
plot: After graduating from Yale in 1962, womanizing Lawrence flees a gambling debt that his rich dad won't pay and takes his roomie's place as Peace Corps Volunteer in Thai Golden Triangle with two other PCVs. Will he survive two years?

title: In the Company of Men
plot: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

title: Medicine Man
plot: In the beautiful and dangerous Amazon rainforest, dissimilar people must make their choices between business, science, and love.
cast: ['Sean Connery', 'Lorraine Bracco', 'José Wilker', 'Rodolfo De Alejandre', 'Francisco Tsiren Tsere Rereme']

title: Careful
plot: The wary residents of a 19th century mountain village must tread carefully and speak softly lest they cause an avalanche. Sexual frenzies teem in this world of repression, setting off incestuous love triangles with deadly consequences.

title: Wide Awake
plot: A 10-year-old boy goes on a search for God after his grandfather dies.

title: Vampires
plot: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.
cast: ['James Woods', 'Daniel Baldwin', 'Sheryl Lee', 'Thomas Ian Griffith', 'Maximilian Schell']

title: Prisoner of the Mountains
plot: Two Russian soldiers, one battle-seasoned and the other barely into his boots and uniform, are taken prisoner by an anxious Islamic father from a remote village hoping to trade them for his captured son.

title: Pleasantville
plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves transported to a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that colorless, complacent world.
cast: ['William H. Macy', 'Joan Allen', 'Natalie Ramsey', 'Kevin Connors', 'Jeff Daniels']

title: Mars Attacks!
plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

title: Men with Guns
plot: Humberto Fuentes is a wealthy doctor whose wife has recently died. In spite of the advice of his children, he takes a trip to visit his former students who now work in impoverished villages. His trip soon becomes a quest, politically awakening him when he finds out that one of his students was killed by the army.—Anonymous
cast: ['Federico Luppi', 'Damián Delgado', 'Dan Rivera González', 'Tania Cruz', 'Damián Alcázar']

title: The Relic
plot: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like God, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.
cast: ['Penelope Ann Miller', 'Tom Sizemore', 'Linda Hunt', 'James Whitmore', 'Clayton Rohner']

title: Andre
plot: The true story of how a seal named Andre befriended a little girl named Toni and her family in 1962.
cast: ['Tina Majorino', 'Chelsea Field', 'Shane Thomas Meier', 'Aidan Pendleton', 'Shirley Broderick']

title: Beloved
plot: A slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman.

title: Quatermass 2
plot: Professor Quatermass, trying to gather support for his Lunar colonisation project, is intrigued by mysterious traces that have been showing up.

title: Traveller
plot: A man joins a group of nomadic con artists in rural North Carolina.

title: Body Shots
plot: A tale of the mysterious, but necessary, mating ritual between men and women of today and everything they think about sex but are afraid to say.
cast: ['Joe Basile', 'Scott Burkholder', 'Liz Coke', 'Allison Dunbar', 'Sean Patrick Flanery']

title: Shanghai Triad
plot: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

title: Poetic Justice
plot: Grieving hairdresser Justice goes on a road trip from South Central L.A. to Oakland on a mail truck alongside her friend and an obnoxious postal worker.
cast: ['Khandi Alexander', 'Maya Angelou', 'Ché J. Avery', 'Lloyd Avery II', 'Kimberly Brooks']

title: Thinner
plot: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.
cast: ['Robert John Burke', 'Lucinda Jenney', 'Bethany Joy Lenz', 'Time Winters', 'Howard Erskine']

title: Down to You
plot: College students Al and Imogen meet and fall in love, but fear of commitment causes them to go their separate ways.
cast: ['Freddie Prinze Jr.', 'Julia Stiles', 'Selma Blair', 'Shawn Hatosy', 'Zak Orth']

title: Nénette and Boni
plot: A brother and sister reunite after time apart. But the sister is pregnant, which could either bring the siblings together or tear them apart.
cast: ['Grégoire Colin', 'Alice Houri', 'Jacques Nolot', 'Valeria Bruni Tedeschi', 'Vincent Gallo']

title: Serial Mom
plot: She's the perfect all-American parent: a great cook and homemaker, a devoted recycler, and a woman who'll literally kill to keep her children happy.

title: Mystery Men
plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.
cast: ['Hank Azaria', 'Janeane Garofalo', 'William H. Macy', 'Kel Mitchell', 'Paul Reubens']

title: Dangerous Liaisons
plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

title: Rosetta
plot: Young and impulsive Rosetta lives with her alcoholic mother and, moved by despair, she will do anything to maintain a job.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
plot: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.
cast: ['Clint Eastwood', 'Chief Dan George', 'Sondra Locke', 'Bill McKinney', 'John Vernon']

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
plot: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Soapdish
plot: An ambitious television soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.
cast: ['Cathy Moriarty', 'Teri Hatcher', 'Robert Downey Jr.', 'Sally Field', 'Paul Johansson']

title: The Bat
plot: A crazed killer known as "The Bat" is on the loose in a mansion full of people.

title: Serpico
plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Murphy's Romance
plot: Emma moves to a ranch with her son after a divorce and befriends the older Murphy, but things turn complicated when her ex shows up.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
cast: ['Martin Balsam', 'John Fiedler', 'Lee J. Cobb', 'E.G. Marshall', 'Jack Klugman']

title: White Man's Burden
plot: In an alternative America where African-Americans and White Americans have reversed cultural roles, a white factory worker kidnaps a black factory owner for dismissing him over perceived disdain.

title: The Nutty Professor
plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.
cast: ['Eddie Murphy', 'Jada Pinkett Smith', 'James Coburn', 'Larry Miller', 'Dave Chappelle']

title: The Opposite of Sex
plot: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

title: Female Perversions
plot: An ambitious female attorney wallows in excess and meaningless sex with both male and female partners, while dealing with her personal life problems including helping her kleptomaniac sister.

title: Diva
plot: Two tapes, two Parisian mob killers, one corrupt policeman, an opera fan, a teenage thief, and the coolest philosopher ever filmed all twist their way through an intricate and stylish French-language thriller.

title: Marty
plot: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: Pajama Party
plot: Sent to Earth to prepare for an invasion, a Martian scout lands amidst a swim party and tries to convince everyone that he really is who he says.

title: My Family
plot: A man makes his way from Mexico to Los Angeles in the 1920s and gets married and raises a big family there. The movie follows the children until they get married and start their families in the 1960s.
cast: ['Edward James Olmos', 'Rafael Cortes', 'Ivette Reina', 'Amelia Zapata', 'Jacob Vargas']

title: In Old California
plot: During the California Gold Rush, Boston pharmacist Tom Craig sets up shop in Sacramento where he clashes with local town crook Britt Dawson.

title: Analyze This
plot: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number-one patient is an insecure mob boss.
cast: ['Robert De Niro', 'Billy Crystal', 'Lisa Kudrow', 'Chazz Palminteri', 'Kresh Novakovic']

title: The Apple Dumpling Gang Rides Again
plot: The adventures of two idiotic outlaw wannabees, Amos and Theodore.

title: Maya Lin: A Strong Clear Vision
plot: A film about the work of the artist most famous for her monuments such as the Vietnam Memorial Wall and the Civil Rights Fountain Memorial.

title: Agnes Browne
plot: The unexpected death of her husband sends a woman and her seven children, ages 2-14, into emotional turmoil and financial crisis in 1967 Dublin. She is forced to borrow money from a ruthless loan shark to make ends meet. She faces her dismal existence by selling fruits and vegetables at an open air market where she spends time with a best friend who gives her encouragement. Wishing to escape her existence, if only for a short time, she dreams of finding enough money to attend an upcoming Tom Jones concert. She realizes her dream by accepting her first date with a French baker. Her kids pool their money so she can buy a new dress. Of course, eventually the family has to face the loan shark, but this is a movie where obstacles are maybe too easily overcome.—John Sacksteder <jsackste@bellsouth.net>
cast: ['Anjelica Huston', "Marion O'Dwyer", "Niall O'Shea", 'Ciaran Owens', 'Roxanna Nic Liam']

title: Tales of Terror
plot: Three tales of terror involve a grieving widower and the daughter he abandoned; a drunkard and his wife's black cat; and a hypnotist who prolongs the moment of a man's death.

title: The Big Green
plot: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texas school, where she coaches the students in soccer, improving their self-esteem and leading to unexpected success.
cast: ['Steve Guttenberg', "Olivia d'Abo", 'Jay O. Sanders', 'John Terry', 'Chauncey Leopardi']

title: Jack & Sarah
plot: A young American woman becomes a nanny in the home of a recent British widower.
cast: ['Richard E. Grant', 'Samantha Mathis', 'Judi Dench', 'Eileen Atkins', 'Cherie Lunghi']

title: 101 Dalmatians/Hype!/The Crucible/Palookaville/Ridicule
plot: Siskel and Ebert review five new movies. And in "The Viewer's Thumb" segment, Gregory Moore criticizes Siskel and Ebert for liking Michael Jordan's acting in "Space Jam", claiming they gave him a break because he lives in Chicago.

title: Die Hard 2
plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: Watership Down
plot: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.
cast: ['John Hurt', 'Richard Briers', 'Michael Graham Cox', 'John Bennett', 'Ralph Richardson']

title: The Mask
plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Crimes of the Heart
plot: Three southern sisters try to come to grips with the meaning of their mother's suicide.

title: Extreme Measures
plot: A young doctor confronts a famous colleague when he learns about the true methods of his work.
cast: ['Hugh Grant', 'Gene Hackman', 'Sarah Jessica Parker', 'David Morse', 'Bill Nunn']

title: Old Yeller
plot: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

title: Affliction
plot: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

title: Reds
plot: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

title: Passion Fish
plot: After an accident leaves her a paraplegic, a former soap opera star struggles to recover both emotionally and mentally, until she meets her newest nurse, who has struggles of her own.

title: Wishmaster
plot: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

title: Sweet and Lowdown
plot: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.

title: The Contender
plot: Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.

title: Magnum Force
plot: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan pursues a conspiracy of vigilante cops, who are not above going beyond the law to kill San Francisco's undesirables.

title: Hoosiers
plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

title: Gabbeh
plot: When an old couple washes their gabbeh - a type of Persian rug - a young woman magically appears and tells them her life story.

title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
plot: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
plot: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.
cast: ['James Spader', 'Andie MacDowell', 'Peter Gallagher', 'Laura San Giacomo', 'Ron Vawter']

title: Love, the Magician
plot: In a Gypsy village, the fathers of Candela and José promise their children to each other. Years later, the unfaithful José marries Candela but while defending his lover Lucía in a brawl, he is stabbed to death. Carmelo, who secretly loves Candela since he was a boy, is arrested while helping José and unfairly sent to prison. Four years later he is released and declares his love for Candela. However, the woman is cursed by a bewitched love and every night she goes to the place where José died to dance with his ghost.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
cast: ['Antonio Gades', 'Cristina Hoyos', 'Laura del Sol', 'Juan Antonio Jiménez', 'Emma Penella']

title: And God Created Woman
plot: Aspiring and incarcerated rock singer, Robin Shea (Rebecca De Mornay) seduces hardworking carpenter Billy Moran (Vincent Spano). Robin marries Billy to get out of jail, but Robin's concerns are on politician James Tiernan (Frank Langella).
cast: ['Rebecca De Mornay', 'Vincent Spano', 'Frank Langella', 'Donovan Leitch Jr.', 'Judith Chapman']

title: Saboteur
plot: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the run to prove his innocence.

title: Saving Grace
plot: A small-town English widow, facing financial troubles after her husband's suicide, turns to agriculture of an illegal kind.

title: Love in the Afternoon
plot: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

title: Courage Under Fire
plot: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.
cast: ['Denzel Washington', 'Meg Ryan', 'Lou Diamond Phillips', 'Michael Moriarty', 'Matt Damon']

title: Anywhere But Here
plot: A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.

title: The Gay Deceivers
plot: Danny and Elliot avoid military service by pretending to be gay, but they have to act the part when the recruiting officer doesn't buy it.
cast: ['Kevin Coughlin', 'Brooke Bundy', 'Lawrence P. Casey', 'Jo Ann Harris', 'Michael Greer']

title: New Nightmare
plot: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather Langenkamp play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

title: Joe Gould's Secret
plot: Around 1940, The New Yorker staff writer Joe Mitchell meets Joe Gould, a Greenwich Village character, who is writing a voluminous Oral History of the World, a record of twenty thousand conversations he's overheard.

title: American Beauty
plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: Super Mario Bros.
plot: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

title: American Women
plot: Irish lads send an ad to the Miami Herald inviting fit and enticing women, between the ages of 20 and 21, to live in their isolated Donegal village. The whole town knows about the ad, and it sharpens everyone's sense of the opportunities for happiness already at hand. Kate, a publican with a young daughter, is separating from her husband and catches the eye of a bachelor sheep farmer. Kieran the butcher realizes that his assistant Siobhan is comely, and then he discovers she's fiery as well. Ollie sends off for Dutch skin magazines that the village postmistress won't release to him. The men, and women, find counsel in their movie-loving priest. Will anyone answer the ad?—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

title: The Transformers: The Movie
plot: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet-consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

title: Dead Ringers
plot: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.
cast: ['Jeremy Irons', 'Geneviève Bujold', 'Heidi von Palleske', 'Barbara Gordon', 'Shirley Douglas']

title: End of Days
plot: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

title: A Bronx Tale
plot: An intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.
cast: ['Robert De Niro', 'Chazz Palminteri', 'Lillo Brancato', 'Francis Capra', 'Taral Hicks']

title: The Spiral Staircase
plot: In 1916, a shadowy serial killer is targeting women with "afflictions"; one night during a thunderstorm, the mute Helen feels menaced.

title: Cotton Mary
plot: A British family is trapped between culture, tradition, and the colonial sins of the past.

title: Ghostbusters II
plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

title: Santa Fe Trail
plot: In 1854, Jeb Stuart, George Custer and other graduates from West Point are posted to Kansas to help pacify the territory before railroad construction to Santa Fe can resume.
cast: ['Errol Flynn', 'Olivia de Havilland', 'Raymond Massey', 'Ronald Reagan', 'Alan Hale']

title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
plot: A 6 y.o. Inuit boy runs off a snowy roof in Copenhagen and dies. Smilla, a half Inuit who lives in the building and knows the boy, looks into it. What makes an acrophobic boy run up on the roof? The clues take her to Greenland.
cast: ['Jens Jørgen Fleischer', 'Julia Ormond', 'Agga Olsen', 'Patrick Field', 'Matthew Marsh']

title: Man on the Moon
plot: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.
cast: ['Jim Carrey', 'Gerry Becker', 'Greyson Erik Pendry', 'Brittany Colonna', 'Leslie Lyles']

title: Anchors Aweigh
plot: A pair of sailors on leave try to help a movie extra become a singing star.

title: The Grand Illusion
plot: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.
cast: ['Jean Gabin', 'Dita Parlo', 'Pierre Fresnay', 'Erich von Stroheim', 'Julien Carette']

title: Practical Magic
plot: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

title: Private Parts
plot: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

title: The Terminator
plot: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.

title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
plot: Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.

title: Lost Horizon
plot: When a revered diplomat's plane is diverted and crashes in the peaks of Tibet, he and the other survivors are guided to an isolated monastery at Shangri-La, where they wrestle with the invitation to stay.
cast: ['Ronald Colman', 'Jane Wyatt', 'Edward Everett Horton', 'John Howard', 'Thomas Mitchell']

title: See the Sea
plot: While waiting her husband return from a business trip, a young woman with a baby is getting close with a strange woman traveler.

title: Citizen Kane
plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

title: A Perfect Candidate
plot: The filmmakers follow Oliver North's unsuccessful 1994 bid for a Virginia Senate seat, focusing on North's campaign strategist, Mark Goodin, and a Washington Post reporter. Mudslinging ensues.

title: Romper Stomper
plot: A group of skinheads become alarmed at the way their neighbourhood is changing.

title: Delicatessen
plot: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

title: Back to the Future Part III
plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.
cast: ['Michael J. Fox', 'Christopher Lloyd', 'Mary Steenburgen', 'Tom Wilson', 'Lea Thompson']

title: Calendar Girl
plot: Three young men go on an end of the summer trip to Hollywood, California. Their quest: to fulfill the fantasy of meeting Marilyn Monroe.

title: Cool Runnings
plot: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.
cast: ['Leon', 'Doug E. Doug', 'Rawle D. Lewis', 'Malik Yoba', 'John Candy']

title: Destination Moon
plot: "Destination Moon", tells the tale of when Doctor Charles Cargraves and retired General Thayer approach Jim Barnes, the head of his own aviation construction firms to help build a rocket that will take them to the moon.

title: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
plot: The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.
cast: ['Lon Chaney Jr.', 'Ilona Massey', 'Patric Knowles', 'Lionel Atwill', 'Bela Lugosi']

title: Flying Tigers
plot: Capt. Jim Gordon's command of the famed American volunteer fighter group in China is complicated by the recruitment of an old friend who is a reckless hotshot.

title: The Replacements
plot: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

title: Around the World in 80 Days
plot: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

title: Jakob the Liar
plot: During World War II, an ordinary inhabitant of a ghetto fakes news about Allied offensives to inspire hope for other victims of the Nazi regime.
cast: ['Robin Williams', 'Hannah Taylor Gordon', 'Éva Igó', 'István Bálint', 'Justus von Dohnányi']

title: Love and a .45
plot: A small time crook flees to Mexico to evade the authorities, loan sharks, and his murderous ex-partner with only his fiancé and a trusted Colt .45.

title: Pitch Black
plot: A transport ship crashes and leaves its crew stranded on a desert planet inhabited by bloodthirsty creatures that come out during an eclipse.

title: Celtic Pride
plot: Two over-loyal Celtic fans kidnap their opponent's star player in order to guarantee their team the championship.

title: U2: Rattle and Hum
plot: A documentary of the Irish rock group U2 on their Fall 1987 tour of North America.

title: Trouble in Paradise
plot: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.
cast: ['Miriam Hopkins', 'Kay Francis', 'Herbert Marshall', 'Charles Ruggles', 'Edward Everett Horton']

title: The Thing from Another World
plot: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

title: Father of the Bride
plot: The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.

title: Wing Commander
plot: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.
cast: ['Freddie Prinze Jr.', 'Saffron Burrows', 'Matthew Lillard', 'Tchéky Karyo', 'Jürgen Prochnow']

title: 'night, Mother
plot: Mother and daughter Thelma and Jessie Cates spend a night together after Jessie reveals that she will kill herself by the end of it in this cinema adaptation of Marsha Norman's Pulitzer prize-winning Broadway play.

title: The Faculty
plot: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, he decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

title: Needful Things
plot: A mysterious new shop opens in a small town which always seems to stock the deepest desires of each shopper, with a price far heavier than expected.
cast: ['Max von Sydow', 'Ed Harris', 'Bonnie Bedelia', 'Amanda Plummer', 'J.T. Walsh']

title: He Got Game
plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

title: Drowning Mona
plot: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.
cast: ['Danny DeVito', 'Bette Midler', 'Neve Campbell', 'Jamie Lee Curtis', 'Casey Affleck']

title: Patton
plot: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.
cast: ['George C. Scott', 'Karl Malden', 'Stephen Young', 'Michael Strong', 'Carey Loftin']

title: Scream
plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.
cast: ['Drew Barrymore', 'Roger Jackson', 'Kevin Patrick Walls', 'David Booth', 'Carla Hatley']

title: Arachnophobia
plot: A new species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to a California town in a coffin and starts to breed, leaving a trail of deaths that puzzle and terrify young Dr. Ross Jennings, who is newly arrived in town with his family.
cast: ['Jeff Daniels', 'Harley Jane Kozak', 'John Goodman', 'Julian Sands', 'Stuart Pankin']

title: Foxfire
plot: Legs Sadovsky gets four other high school girls to think for themselves and react to a teacher's sexual harassment, which gets them suspended. They bond, and rebel, at an abandoned house.

title: Plunkett & Macleane
plot: Two robbers are persecuted by the law, whose servants are not much better and even worse.
cast: ['Jonny Lee Miller', 'Iain Robertson', 'Robert Carlyle', 'Ken Stott', 'Liv Tyler']

title: Twin Dragons
plot: Identical twins are separated at birth, one becoming a streetwise mechanic, and the other an acclaimed classical concert conductor. Finally meeting in adulthood, they each become mistaken for the other and entangled in each other's world.
cast: ['Jackie Chan', 'Maggie Cheung', 'Teddy Robin Kwan', 'James Wong', 'Sylvia Chang']

title: Lulu on the Bridge
plot: A famous jazz saxophonist's life is forever changed after he is accidentally shot.

title: The Very Thought of You
plot: Three childhood friends separately fall for cute American Martha, and within three days of her arrival at a London airport, their friendship is at risk.

title: House Party 2
plot: When Kid's college money is stolen by a crooked music promoter, Play's solution is to stage the 'mutha' of all pajama parties. Starring Kid 'n Play and Martin Lawrence.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
plot: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

title: Happy, Texas
plot: 3 prisoners escape. 2 end up in Happy, Texas, where they're mistaken for a gay couple expected there to help with the small girls beauty pageant. As the 2 are paid $1000, they decide to stay until the heat is gone.
cast: ['Jeremy Northam', 'Steve Zahn', 'William H. Macy', 'Ally Walker', 'Illeana Douglas']

title: The Conformist
plot: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

title: Chinese Box
plot: The story of Hong Kong, from New Year's Day to June 30th, 1997, when the British left their colony and turned it over to the People's Republic of China.

title: Shadowlands
plot: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned Christian theologian, writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham from the U.S.

title: The Doors
plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
plot: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the horrible events of Hellraiser (1987), where the occult-obsessive head doctor resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites and their demonic underworld.

title: The Blue Lagoon
plot: During the Victorian period, two preteen cousins are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific and enjoy a simple life together until puberty complicates matters.

title: The Sweet Hereafter
plot: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to defend the families, but he discovers everything isn't what it seems.

title: Yojimbo
plot: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

title: A Family Thing
plot: When an old woman dies, she leaves a note for her apparent son (Robert Duvall) which tells him that his biological mother died giving birth to him. She begs him to make peace with his half-brother (James Earl Jones) living in Chicago.
cast: ['Robert Duvall', 'James Earl Jones', 'Michael Beach', 'Irma P. Hall', 'Grace Zabriskie']

title: The Dark Crystal
plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
plot: An apprentice witch, three kids, and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

title: Mansfield Park
plot: Fanny, born into a poor family, is sent away to live with wealthy uncle Sir Thomas, his wife and their four children, where she'll be brought up for a proper introduction to society.
cast: ['Hannah Taylor Gordon', 'Talya Gordon', 'Lindsay Duncan', 'Bruce Byron', 'James Purefoy']

title: Safe Passage
plot: A mother with seven sons feels like she's losing control of her life and her family. But personal pain and a troubled marriage fade into the background as news comes that one of her sons might have died in an accident.
cast: ['Susan Sarandon', 'Nick Stahl', 'Sam Shepard', 'Marcia Gay Harden', 'Robert Sean Leonard']

title: Horror of Dracula
plot: When Jonathan Harker rouses the ire of Count Dracula for accepting a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses, his friend Dr. Van Helsing pursues the predatory villain.

title: Urban Legends: Final Cut
plot: A film school is the center of a fresh spate of killings based on urban legends.

title: Freeway
plot: A twisted take on "Little Red Riding Hood", with a teenage juvenile delinquent on the run from a social worker travelling to her grandmother's house and being hounded by a charming, but sadistic, serial killer and pedophile.

title: My Blue Heaven
plot: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
plot: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the owners must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.
cast: ['Rod Taylor', "J. Pat O'Malley", 'Betty Lou Gerson', 'Martha Wentworth', 'Ben Wright']

title: Thunderball
plot: James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.
cast: ['Sean Connery', 'Claudine Auger', 'Adolfo Celi', 'Luciana Paluzzi', 'Rik Van Nutter']

title: Ghost in the Shell
plot: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: The Last Picture Show
plot: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

title: Pet Sematary
plot: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

title: Hard Target
plot: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her missing father. In the process, they discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance.

title: Thelma & Louise
plot: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two women escape for the crimes they committed.

title: Oxygen
plot: Two guys kidnap the wife of a rich man and bury her in a box with 24 hours of oxygen. Tough NYPD Detective Maddy and others get the case. Will they get to her in time?

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
plot: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

title: The Opportunists
plot: A struggling auto mechanic with a criminal past agrees to one last heist to pay off his debts.

title: Slumber Party Massacre II
plot: Courtney Bates, the younger sister of Valerie, and her friends go to a condo for a weekend getaway, but Courtney can't get rid of the haunting feeling that a supernatural rockabilly driller killer is coming to murder them all.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

title: Tank Girl
plot: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

title: Brighton Beach Memoirs
plot: Eugene, a young teenage Jewish boy, recalls his memoirs of his time as an adolescent youth. He goes through the hardships of puberty, sexual fantasy, and living the life of a poor boy in a crowded house.

title: RocketMan
plot: Fred Z. Randall is a geeky spacecraft designer who gets the chance to make his dream come true and travel to Mars.
cast: ['Harland Williams', 'Jessica Lundy', 'William Sadler', 'Jeffrey DeMunn', 'James Pickens Jr.']

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
plot: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

title: Heavy
plot: The life of an overweight, unhappy cook is changed after a kind, beautiful college drop-out comes to work as a waitress at his and his mother's road-side restaurant.
cast: ['Pruitt Taylor Vince', 'Shelley Winters', 'Liv Tyler', 'Debbie Harry', 'Joe Grifasi']

title: Ride with the Devil
plot: During the American Civil War, two friends join the Bushwhackers, a militant group loyal to the Confederacy.
cast: ['Tobey Maguire', 'Jeremy W. Auman', 'Scott Sener', 'Skeet Ulrich', 'Glenn Q. Pierce']
